ref: 10774 *ruddha1 ʻ grown ʼ. [If ancient as pp. of rṓdhati, rṓhati, it is anal. replacement of rūḍhá -- of same type as buddhá -- for earlier *būḍha -- ; but more prob. it is MIA. or even M. anal. pp. formed from pres. st. rujjhaï (< *ruhyati) after type bujjhaï ~ buddha -- . -- √ruh]
M. rudhṇẽ ʻ to sprout, grow ʼ.
